data.title: Adolph Menzel (1815–1905)
authors: PICRYL - Public Domain Media Search Engine
data.meta_description: Find Adolph Menzel (1815–1905); German painter images from PICRYL - Public Domain Media Search Engine's collection of Adolph Menzel (1815–1905) - public domain images and copyrighted media
data.text: Adolph Menzel (1815–1905) was a German Realist artist noted for drawings, etchings, and paintings. Along with Caspar David Friedrich, he is considered one of the two most prominent German artists of the 19th century and was the most successful artist of his era in Germany. First known as Adolph Menzel, he was knighted in 1898 and changed his name to Adolph von Menzel.
